description:
The Python Porto community with support of Jumia Group is thrilled to announce a free introductory workshop “Data Science with Python”. The goal is to allow guests with some Python experience to understand how this knowledge can be applied to the area of Data Science.

If you have some prior experience with Python or any other programming language and curious how you can apply this knowledge for Data Science specific tasks, we invite you for a two-hour free workshop. It takes place on 28 Jun, Thursday, at 18h30 in the Jumia Porto Tech Center. The address is Rua Ricardo Severo 3, 1st floor (close to Rotunda da Boavista).

Our mentor, Francisca Dias is a Data Analyst at Jumia Group and a core member of the Python Porto community.

Knowledge you get on the workshop will be enough to kick-start the process of self learning and experimenting with Python for Data Science.
name: Workshop “Data Science with Python”
